description.value: You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Elemental Betrayal]{Elemental Betrayal} hex. Your familiar learns your choice of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Burning Hands]{Burning Hands}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Air Bubble]{Air Bubble}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Hydraulic Push]{Hydraulic Push}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Pummeling Rubble]{Pummeling Rubble}.
